translations: v.压迫；折磨（oppress 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: 被压迫的, 压迫, 被压迫者, 受压迫的
被压迫者, 被压迫的人们, 受压迫者, 受压迫的
被压迫者教育学, 被压迫者的教育学, 受压迫教育学

sentences.sentence: He received acclaim as a champion of the oppressed.
sentences.translation: 他作为被压迫者的捍卫者而受到了赞誉。

sentences.sentence: He had dedicated his life to bettering the lot of the oppressed people of South Africa.
sentences.translation: 他一生致力于改善南非被压迫人民的命运。

sentences.sentence: The people of an oppressed country obey their conquerors because they want to go on living.
sentences.translation: 一个被压迫国家的人民顺从他们的征服者，是因为他们想活下去。
